topic.title: Registered Types
topic.p: Reflectable C++ types under some C++ namespaces are usually registered with other names in other namespaces. Here are all types in this library that are registered.
When VCZH_DEBUG_NO_REFLECTION is on, types will not be registered.

In this topic, you can find all reflectable types that are registered by the following functions in ::vl::reflection::description namespace.
VlppReflection:
LoadPredefinedTypes
VlppParser:
LoadParsingTypes
XmlLoadTypes
JsonLoadTypes
VlppParser2:
LoadParsing2Types
XmlAstLoadTypes
JsonAstLoadTypes
Workflow-Runtime:
WfLoadLibraryTypes
Workflow-Compiler:
WorkflowAstLoadTypes
GacUI:
By linking GacUIReflection.cpp to your C++ project without setting VCZH_DEBUG_NO_REFLECTION, all types will be automatically registered, except Workflow-Compiler and GacUI-Compiler.
The following functions are called in any reflection mode:
LoadPredefinedTypes
LoadParsing2Types
XmlAstLoadTypes
JsonAstLoadTypes
WfLoadLibraryTypes
LoadGuiBasicTypes
LoadGuiElementTypes
LoadGuiCompositionTypes
LoadGuiEventTypes
LoadGuiTemplateTypes
LoadGuiControlTypes
GacUI also offers additional types:
LoadDarkSkinTypes
LoadGuiFakeDialogServiceUITypes
GacUI-Compiler:
GuiInstanceQueryAstLoadTypes
